name: Da Nang
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Da Nang is the commercial and educational center of Central Vietnam and is the largest city in the region.

name: Quang Nam
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Quang Nam is a province in the Central Coast region of Vietnam that is famous for its historical and cultural sites, such as the ancient town of Hoi An

name: Quang Ngai
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Quang Ngai is famous for the cultural vestiges of Chau Sa Citadel, Ong and Mai Son pagodas.

name: Binh Dinh
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Binh Dinh is home to ancient Cham towers, pagodas, islands, museums and hot springs. Binh Dinh is also home to many ethnic groups (including the Ba Na and Cham)

name: Phu Yen
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Phu Yen is a province in central Vietnam, belted top to bottom by a dramatic mountain range and hemmed in on its eastern border by 200 kilometres of coastline.

name: Khanh Hoa
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Khanh Hoa famous for its beautiful beaches as well as water sports

name: Ninh Thuận
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Stunning beaches and sand dunes, lush green mountains, and vibrant culture are all glowing words whenever people mention Ninh Thuan

name: Bình Thuận
subtitle: Central Southern Coast
description: Binh Thuan has three types of topography: mountainous, plain and coastal. The coast longs over 192km with many capes: La Gan, Mui Nho, Mui Rom, Mui Ne, Ke Ga.
